Sentencas: The electrode performances of the alternative oxides: La0.05Ca0.95Cr0.05Ti0.95O3-delta-8YSZ and Ce0.8TM0.2O2-delta(TM=Mn, Co) for the direct electrochemical oxidation of methane are investigated to assess their potentials anode materials for efficient methane conversion in a SOFC.
Titulo: Performance of alternative oxide anodes for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and methane in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen was also studied, fro comparison.
Titulo: Performance of alternative oxide anodes for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and methane in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The oxides are characterised electrochemically with impedance spectroscopy in a frequency range from 10 mHz to 1 mHz, using a three electrode geometry.
Titulo: Performance of alternative oxide anodes for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and methane in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: They are compared to a standard Ni/8YSZ anode for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen.
Titulo: Performance of alternative oxide anodes for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and methane in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It is found that La0.05Ca0.95Cr0.05Ti0.95O3-delta demonstrates a poor electrochemical activity in both hydrogen and methane.
Titulo: Performance of alternative oxide anodes for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and methane in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, the electrochemical activity of Ce0.8Mn0.2O2-delta is promising, but the electronic conductivity needs to be increased, e.g., by adding a conducting oxide, before it can be used as an anode material in a SOFC.
Titulo: Performance of alternative oxide anodes for the electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and methane in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
